TEXT.TITLE: PAPERBOARD TO SELL 93 MLN DLRS OF NOTES
TEXT.BODY: <Paperboard Industries Corp> said it agreed to sell 93 mln dlrs of convertible notes, with half to be purchased by brokers Wood Gundy Inc and McLeod Young Weir Ltd and the other half by controlling shareholder Kinburn Industrial Corp. The notes will be convertible into six mln common shares at 15.50 dlrs a share by September 30. Paperboard now has 6,057,495 shares outstanding. Proceeds will be used partly to finance the previously announced acquisition of Belkin Inc. Purchase of notes will be conditional on Paperboard acquiring 98.2 pct of Belkin's shares from Balaclava Enterprises Ltd. Reuter
